item.title: Multi-Omics Integration Strategy and Deep Diving into MOFA2
item.description: body { text-align: justify} Todayâ€™s guest blog post on multiOmics integration is written by Aditi Qamra and edited by Tommy. If you want to do a guest posting in my blog which gets 30k views per month, feel free to contact me on LinkedIn. Aditi is a senior data scientist working on biomarker discovery and early product development at Roche, using multimodal clinical and genomic data. She has a PhD and postdoc in epigenomics of solid tumors and enjoys upskilling herself in stats topics.
